sentences.en: After only a short exposure to sunlight he began to turn red.
sentences.cn: 他在阳光下只晒了一会儿,皮肤就开始变红了.

sentences.en: An exposure of one - hundredth of a second will be enough.
sentences.cn: 曝光百分之一秒就够了.

sentences.en: At least two people died of exposure in Chicago overnight.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上，芝加哥至少有两人冻死。

sentences.en: Continuous exposure to sound above 80 decibels could be harmful.
sentences.cn: 持续暴露在强度高于80分贝的噪声中可能有害。

sentences.en: Exposure to lead is known to damage the brains of young children.
sentences.cn: 已知接触铅会损害幼童的大脑。

sentences.en: Have you ever had any skin problems connected with exposure to the sun?
sentences.cn: 你曾因日晒出现过皮肤问题吗？

sentences.en: He was suffering from exposure and shock but his condition was said to be stable.
sentences.cn: 他被冻伤了，而且出现了休克，但是据说情况稳定。

sentences.en: His nose had been reddened by unaccustomed exposure to the California sun.
sentences.cn: 经过加州阳光不同寻常的照射，他的鼻子晒红了。

sentences.en: I threatened them with public exposure.
sentences.cn: 我扬言要公开揭发他们.

sentences.en: My bedroom has a southern exposure.
sentences.cn: 我的卧室朝南。

sentences.en: Prolonged exposure to the sun can cause skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 长时间晒太阳会导致皮肤癌。

sentences.en: Skin thickens, dries and coarsens after sun exposure.
sentences.cn: 晒后皮肤会变厚、变干、变粗糙。

sentences.en: the exposure of his underground political activity
sentences.cn: 对他地下政治活动的揭露

sentences.en: The failure of their marriage has got a lot of exposure recently.
sentences.cn: 他俩婚姻失败一事最近被频频曝光。

sentences.en: The house has a southern exposure.
sentences.cn: 这房子向阳.

sentences.en: The production of melanin in the skin is stimulated by exposure to the sun.
sentences.cn: 皮肤暴露在阳光下就很容易生成黑色素。

sentences.en: The room has a southern exposure.
sentences.cn: 这间屋向阳.

sentences.en: Their cancers are not so clearly tied to radiation exposure.
sentences.cn: 他们的癌症是否和接触放射线有关还不太清楚。

sentences.en: Their sporting reputation has suffered enormously from Johnson's exposure.
sentences.cn: 由于约翰逊东窗事发，他们的体育声誉受到了严重损害。

sentences.en: There is convincing evidence of a link between exposure to sun and skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 有可靠证据表明日光曝晒与皮肤癌之间有联系。

sentences.en: We nearly died of exposure on the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 我们差点冻死在半山腰。
